alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:59PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gove County through 530 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gove, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grainfield. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 90 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
